official_title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 300 Quarropas Street in White Plains, New York, as the "Charles L. Brieant, Jr. Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building and U.S. courthouse located at 300 Quarropas Street in White Plains, New York, as the Charles L. Brieant, Jr. Federal Building and United States Courthouse.
